title: J1V: Verification Methods for Energy Efficiency

contentBlocks.title: Class 2 Buildings - NABERS Energy Verification
items: J1V1-minimum 4-star NABERS Energy for Apartment Buildings:
(b) AC ≥18 hrs/day in common lift lobbies/corridors; and
(ii) PMV -1 to +1 in ≥95% common areas (excl. pools) for ≥98% hours; and
(iii) pool chambers +2°C above pool temp for ≥12 hrs/day; and
(5)The calculation method for must comply with ANSI/ASHRAE Standard 140

contentBlocks.title: Class 2 Buildings - Green Star Alternative
items: (a) registered for Green Star Design & As-Built or Buildings rating; and
(c) PMV -1 to +1 in ≥95% areas for ≥98% hours; and

contentBlocks.title: Class 3 Buildings - NABERS Energy Verification
items: (ii) PMV -1 to +1 in ≥95% areas (excl. pools) for ≥98% hours; and
(iii) pool chambers +2°C above pool temp for ≥12 hrs/day; and
(5)The calculation method for must comply with ANSI/ASHRAE Standard 140

contentBlocks.title: Class 3 Buildings - Green Star Alternative
items: (a) registered for Green Star Design & As-Built or Buildings rating; and
(c) PMV -1 to +1 in ≥95% areas for ≥98% hours; and

contentBlocks.title: Class 5 Buildings - NABERS Energy Verification
items: (C) PMV -1 to +1 across ≥95% floor area for ≥98% hours; and

contentBlocks.title: Class 5 Buildings - Green Star Alternative
items: (a) registered for Green Star Design & As-Built or Buildings rating; and
(c) PMV -1 to +1 in ≥95% areas for ≥98% hours; and

contentBlocks.title: Class 6 Buildings - NABERS Energy Verification
items: J1V1-minimum 4.5-star NABERS Energy for Shopping Centres:
(i) ≥20% AC common area of GLA; and
(ii) PMV -1 to +1 in ≥95% AC spaces for ≥98% hours; and

contentBlocks.title: Class 6 Buildings - Green Star Alternative
items: (a) registered for Green Star Design & As-Built or Buildings rating; and
(c) PMV -1 to +1 in ≥95% areas for ≥98% hours; and

contentBlocks.title: Other Building Classes - Green Star Alternative
items: (a) registered for Green Star Design & As-Built or Buildings rating; and
(c) PMV -1 to +1 in ≥95% areas for ≥98% hours; and
